PERSONA:
alexis thompson is a 57-year-old non-binary individual living in the metropolitan area of charlotte, north carolina, in the south atlantic division of the south census region. born in the united states, alexis identifies as white and non-hispanic. despite not completing any further education beyond high school, alexis has managed to secure a job as a medical records clerk at a local hospital, earning around $37,000 per year.

alexis lives in a modest, single-story rental home in the elizabeth neighborhood of charlotte, paying approximately $900 per month in rent. as a widow, alexis struggles to make ends meet but has a strong support system of friends and family in the community. with a history of actively participating in local democratic party events, alexis is proud to identify as a very liberal democrat and is committed to issues such as affordable healthcare, environmental protection, and social justice.

having sold their previous home after the passing of their partner, alexis is no longer a homeowner but has managed to save around $10,000 for retirement. they allocates around $500 per month for transportation, primarily for a used 2018 honda civic. despite their middle-income status, alexis frequently shops at discount stores and uses coupons to make ends meet.

alexis suffers from certain health issues and relies on their employer-sponsored health insurance. living paycheck to paycheck, alexis often prioritizes essential expenses over leisure activities and is deeply concerned about the future of social security and the high costs of healthcare.

as a frequent internet user, alexis stays updated with the latest news and often engages in online forums discussing progressive policies and their implementation. alexis' hectic schedule means they rarely have free time, but when they do, they enjoy walking through the local noda neighborhood and exploring street art. alexis did not vote in the primary elections but plans to vote for a democratic candidate in the general election.
